DOC.detailed_description: This multicenter , long-term study sirukumab ( CNTO 136 ) conduct two group participant time ( parallel-group study ) . The maximum duration participation study 208 week , follow approximately 16 week safety efficacy follow-up administration final study agent injection sirukumab . Participant safety monitor throughout study .
